title: Muramana Urgot Bug [Gameplay]
body:
This bug involves the Champion Urgot.
Acid Hunter[Q] with Muramana activated on Minions ,Jungle Monsters and Champions deal the same damage as Muramana not activated.
That means Acid Hunter doesn't benefit from Muramana and don't apply the bonus physical dmg on hit.

Autoattacks from Urgot still trigger the bonus physical damage from Muramana but the Acid Hunters won't trigger the bonus physical dmg ,although the visual hit-effect of Muramana is shown with each Acid Hunter hit on a target.

replies.body: So, I think I know what's going on here. If the Acid Hunter, before the Muramana bonus damage is applied, deals enough damage to kill the target, the damage text will only show the pre Muramana damage. Basically, the enemy dies before the rest of the damage can be applied. From what I can see Acid Hunter's otherwise always applying the bonus damage as expected, so there's no gameplay impact (though this does look a little weird visually). Let me know if you're seeing otherwise.

Alright, just tested what you wrote and it happens ,that you're right.

If Acid Hunter kills the target , the visual trigger of Muramana will occur but you won't see the bonus damage from it. The bonus dmg still triggers on a target which isn't killed by Acid Hunter, however normal attacks always trigger the bonus damage(killing the target or not doesn't matter).

Thanks for your help :D

This thread can be closed.
